translation.addHabitQuestion: What habit would you like to achieve?
translation.confirmUser: The name of the user will be:
translation.information: A habit is a repetitive behavior or routine that you perform almost automatically, often without consciously thinking about it. Habits can be both positive and negative, shaping our daily lives and long-term outcomes. It's often said that it takes around 21 to 66 days of consistent practice to turn an activity into a habit, though the exact timeframe can vary from person to person. Tracking your habits can help you become more aware of your actions and work towards the goal of making them a natural part of your daily life for a healthier and more productive lifestyle.
translation.noAchievedHabits: You don't have any achieved habits yet. Achieve one and it will appear here!
translation.noHabits: You don't have any habits yet. Create one!
translation.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your new habit-building and life transformation assistant. To get started, all we need is your name.
